turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. I would like to order an Americano espresso from the Starbucks on 87th Street in Chicago. I want sugar, honey, and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. so you said you wanted 1 tall iced americano with sugar, honey and whipped cream from starbucks on 87th street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the total for your order is $5.29. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. i've placed the order. the receipt has been sent to your phone. it'll be ready in 10 mins.
